/* UserRepository.ListUser */
SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_ACCOUNT, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, IF(H.QUIT_YMD IS NULL, C.COMPANY_NAME, CONCAT(C.COMPANY_NAME, '(퇴사)')) AS COMPANY_NAME, CD.CODE_VALUE AS RANK_CODE, CD.CODE_NAME AS RANK_CODE_NAME, CD2.CODE_VALUE AS JOB_TITLE_CODE, CD2.CODE_NAME AS JOB_TITLE_CODE_NAME, U.USER_ACTIVE_YN, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(R.ROLE_NAME ORDER BY R.ROLE_ORDER SEPARATOR ', ') FROM CO_USER_ROLE UR INNER JOIN CO_ROLE R ON R.ROLE_ID = UR.ROLE_ID WHERE UR.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ) AS ROLES_STRING FROM CO_USER U
INNER JOIN CO_USER_ROLE UR ON UR.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
INNER JOIN HM_EMPLOYEE E ON E.USER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN HM_WORK_HISTORY H ON H.EMPLOYEE_ID = E.EMPLOYEE_ID AND H.COMPANY_ID = E.COMPANY_ID AND H.DELETE_YN = 'N' LEFT JOIN HM_COMPANY C ON C.COMPANY_ID = H.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD ON CD.CODE_VALUE = H.RANK_CODE AND CD.UP_CODE_ID = 'RANK_00' LEFT JOIN CO_CODE CD2 ON CD2.CODE_VALUE = H.JOB_TITLE_CODE AND CD2.UP_CODE_ID = 'JOB_TITLE_00' WHERE U.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND UR.ROLE_ID IN
@roleId
GROUP BY H.EMPLOYEE_ID, H.COMPANY_ID ORDER BY U.USER_ID DESC

/* UserRepository.GetUser */
SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_ACCOUNT, U.USER_ACTIVE_YN, DATE_FORMAT(U.LAST_LOGIN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LAST_LOGIN_DT FROM CO_USER U WHERE 1=1 AND U.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND U.USER_ID = @UserId
AND U.USER_ACCOUNT = @UserAccount

/* UserRepository.GetUserLogin */
SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_ACCOUNT, U.USER_PASSWORD, U.USER_ACTIVE_YN FROM CO_USER U WHERE U.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND U.USER_ACCOUNT = @UserAccount

/* UserRepository.GetUserFindInfo */
SELECT U.USER_ACCOUNT, E.EMPLOYEE_NAME, E.PHONE_NO, E.EMAIL_ADDR, U.CREATE_DT, U.LAST_LOGIN_DT FROM CO_USER U INNER JOIN HM_EMPLOYEE E ON E.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE U.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND E.EMAIL_ADDR = @EmailAddr
AND E.EMPLOYEE_NAME = @EmployeeName
AND U.USER_ACCOUNT = @UserAccount

/* UserRepository.GetUserPassword */
SELECT U.USER_PASSWORD FROM CO_USER U WHERE U.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND U.USER_ID = @UserId

/* UserRepository.UpdateUser */
UPDATE CO_USER SET
USER_ACTIVE_YN = @UserActiveYn,
UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE USER_ID = @UserId

/* UserRepository.UpdateUserLastLoginDt */
UPDATE CO_USER SET LAST_LOGIN_DT = SYSDATE(), UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE USER_ID = @UserId

/* UserRepository.UpdateUserPassword */
UPDATE CO_USER SET USER_PASSWORD = @NewPassword, UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE USER_ID = @UserId

/* UserRepository.RemoveUser */
UPDATE CO_USER SET DELETE_YN = 'Y', UPDATER_ID = @UpdaterId, UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE USER_ID = @UserId
